title: Malecón of Coyuca de Benítez
description: The Malecón of Coyuca de Benítez is a lively waterfront area where locals and visitors gather. It’s perfect for strolling, enjoying sunsets, and taking in the town’s coastal atmosphere.

title: Coyuca Lagoon
description: Coyuca Lagoon is a scenic natural attraction with calm waters, mangroves, and rich wildlife. Visitors can take boat tours, fish, or simply enjoy the tranquility of this unique ecosystem.

title: Local Market
description: The Local Market in Coyuca de Benítez is a vibrant hub of culture and commerce. Here, visitors can taste regional dishes, buy fresh produce, and find traditional crafts, reflecting the town’s authentic Guerrero charm.
